description: Network Security Perimeters allow administrators to define logical network isolation boundaries and configure common external access controls for PaaS resources.

tables.description: Logs of Network Security Perimeter (NSP) inbound access allowed based on NSP access rules.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp marking the start of event aggregation.

columns.name: TimeGeneratedEndTime
columns.description: Timestamp indicating the end of event aggregation.

columns.name: Count
columns.description: Total number of aggregated events.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: Indicates top-level PaaS operation name.

columns.name: OperationVersion
columns.description: The API version associated with the operation.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: NSP access log categories.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Indicates the region of NSP.

columns.name: ResultDescription
columns.description: Additional description about the operation result, when available.

columns.name: Profile
columns.description: Name of the NSP profile associated to the resource.

columns.name: Parameters
columns.description: List of optional PaaS resource properties in key-value pair format. For example: [ {Param1}: {value1}, {Param2}: {value2}, ...].

columns.name: ServiceResourceId
columns.description: Resource ID of PaaS resource emitting NSP access logs.

columns.name: ServiceFqdn
columns.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of PaaS resource emitting NSP access logs.

columns.name: AppId
columns.description: Unique GUID representing the app ID of resource in the Azure Active Directory.

columns.name: MatchedRule
columns.description: JSON property bag containing matched access rule name. It can be either NSP access rule name or resource rule name (not it's resource ID).

columns.name: SourceResourceId
columns.description: Resource ID of source PaaS resource for an inbound connection, when available.

columns.name: SourceIpAddress
columns.description: IP address of source making inbound connection, when available.

columns.name: SourcePort
columns.description: Port number of inbound connection, when available.

columns.name: SourceProtocol
columns.description: Application layer protocol and transport layer protocol used for inbound connection in the format {AppProtocol}:{TransportProtocol}. For example: 'HTTPS:TCP'. It be must specified if available.

columns.name: SourcePerimeterGuids
columns.description: List of perimeter GUIDs of source resource. It should be specified only if allowed based on perimeter GUID.

columns.name: SourceAppId
columns.description: Unique GUID representing the app ID of source in the Azure Active Directory.

columns.name: SourceParameters
columns.description: List of optional source properties in key-value pair format. For example: [ {Param1}: {value1}, {Param2}: {value2}, ...].

columns.name: DestinationResourceId
columns.description: Resource ID of destination PaaS resource for an outbound connection, when available.

columns.name: DestinationFqdn
columns.description: Fully Qualified Domain(FQDN) name of the destination.

columns.name: DestinationParameters
columns.description: List of optional destination properties in key-value pair format. For example: [ {Param1}: {value1}, {Param2}: {value2}, ...].

columns.name: DestinationPort
columns.description: Port number of outbound connection, when available.

columns.name: DestinationProtocol
columns.description: Application layer protocol and transport layer protocol used for outbound connection in the format {AppProtocol}:{TransportProtocol}. For example: 'HTTPS:TCP'. It be must specified if available.

columns.name: DestinationEmailAddress
columns.description: Email address of destination receiver. It be must specified if available.

columns.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
columns.description: Phone number of destination receiver. It be must specified if available.

columns.name: AccessRuleVersion
columns.description: Access rule version of the NSP profile to which PaaS resource is associated.

columns.name: ResultDirection
columns.description: Direction of evaluation result whether 'Inbound' or 'Outbound'.

columns.name: ResultAction
columns.description: Indicates whether the result of evaluation is 'Approved' or 'Denied'.

columns.name: RuleType
columns.description: Indicates where the rule is defined: NSP or PaaS resource.

columns.name: TrafficType
columns.description: Indicates whether traffic is 'Private', 'Public', 'Intra' or 'Cross' perimeter.
